clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Prospective Multicentric Clinical Follow up of Patients After Being Treated With TricValve®
clinical_study.official_title: TRICUS REGISTRY - Retrospective Prospective Multicentric Clinical Follow up of Patients With Severe Tricuspid Regurgitation After Being Treated With the TricValve® Transcatheter Bicaval Valves System.

brief_summary.textblock: Retrospective prospective Multicentric clinical follow up of patients with severe tricuspid regurgitation after being treated with the TricValve® Transcatheter Bicaval Valves System.

detailed_description.textblock:
The study shall enrol subjects who were treated with the TricValve® Transcatheter Bicaval Valves System® in the Inferior Vena Cava and Superior vena cava. On compliance with the inclusion / exclusion criteria the subject will be enrolled for the observational study.
The study duration for the individual subject will be up to 5 year follow up. The follow-up should be made through pre-established periodic clinical consultations at discharge, 1 month, 6 months, 1 year follow up to 5 years after the procedure. In the consultations, routine exams such as hemogram, renal function, electrocardiogram and echocardiography in order to ascertain the bioprosthesis functioning and its hemodynamic profile are documented as per clinical routine practise.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with readmission for HF
primary_outcome.description: First unplanned readmission for Heart Failure

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days, up to 6 months, up to 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients in terms of all cause mortality

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants with major adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with major adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with severe adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days, up to 6 months, up to 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with severe adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with readmission for HF
secondary_outcome.description: First unplanned readmission for Heart Failure

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days, up to 6 months, up to 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Change of New York Heart Association (NYHA) functional class from III or IV to a lower one

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in BNP/NTproBNP and diuretic dosage
secondary_outcome.description: Change in BNP/NTproBNP and diuretic dosage before intervention after intervention

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of the right atrium size
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days, up to 6 months, up to 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Change of the Right Atrium Size assessed by echocardiography

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of the free valve movement
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days, up to 6 months, up to 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Change of the free valve movement assessed by echocardiography

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days, up to 6 months, up to 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients with valve device regurgitation assessed by echocardiography

secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 30 days, up to 6 months, up to 5 years
secondary_outcome.description: Number of alive patients free from reintervention related to TricValve System

study_pop.textblock: The study shall enrol subjects who were treated with the TricValve® Transcatheter Bicaval Valves System® in the Inferior Vena Cava and Superior vena cava. On compliance with the inclusion / exclusion criteria the subject will be enrolled for the observational study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Successful treatment with TricValve Transcatheter Bicaval Valves System
- Patient/patient's authorized legal guardian gives his consent to participate in the study and signed the corresponding inform consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- no exclusion criterion

facility.name: Hospital Universitari Germans Trias i Pujol
Hospital Universitario Reina Sofia de Córdoba
